title: Implement vsock communication layer
description: Host-to-guest communication via virtio-vsock. RPC protocol for commands, file sync, and PTY multiplexing.

title: Design Firecracker-inspired microkernel architecture
description: Research and design the core microkernel architecture inspired by Firecracker. Focus on minimal attack surface, fast startup, and memory isolation for agent processes. Implementation in Rust.
close_reason: Updated architecture doc with detailed guest agent, vsock, and implementation plan

title: Add permission/restriction profiles
description: Define security profiles (permissive, moderate, restrictive) that control what sandboxed code can access. Network, filesystem, environment variables, etc.

title: Add Podman backend support
description: Support Podman as an alternative to Docker for container-based sandboxing. Podman is rootless by default and doesn't require a daemon.
close_reason: Implemented container backend supporting both Docker and Podman. Runtime is auto-detected (prefers Podman if available).

title: Build standalone executable
description: Package the system as a standalone executable binary. Should work cross-platform (macOS, Linux) with minimal dependencies.

title: Create local CLI interface
description: Build a local CLI for managing agent sandboxes. Commands for: create, start, stop, attach, list, and configure sandboxes.
close_reason: Implemented full CLI: init, create, start, stop, remove, attach (interactive shell), exec (run commands), list. Added helpful next-steps messaging.

title: Build minimal rootfs for microVMs
description: Create Alpine-based rootfs (~20MB) with busybox, networking, and base utilities. Support squashfs for read-only base.
close_reason: Built and verified base/python/node rootfs images, fixed Alpine community repo issue

title: Add macOS Seatbelt sandbox backend
description: Lightweight sandbox option for macOS using sandbox-exec (Seatbelt). Faster than containers, no Docker required. Similar to Gemini CLI's approach.

title: Add multi-agent support (Claude Code, Gemini CLI, Codex, OpenCode)
description: Implement adapters for multiple AI coding agents: Claude Code, Gemini CLI, Codex, and OpenCode. Each adapter should handle agent-specific configuration and execution patterns.

title: (EPIC) Firecracker Microkernel Pivot
description: Pivot from Docker containers to Firecracker microVMs for true hardware isolation. See plan/firecracker-pivot.md for details.

title: Add MCP server for Claude Code integration
description: Implement an MCP (Model Context Protocol) server so Claude Code and other MCP-compatible agents can use agentkernel for sandboxed execution. Commands: agentkernel mcp-server
close_reason: Completed - MCP server implemented with JSON-RPC 2.0 over stdio, tools: sandbox_run, sandbox_create, sandbox_exec, sandbox_list, sandbox_remove

title: Build guest agent for microVMs
description: Lightweight agent binary that runs inside microVM. Handles commands from host over vsock, file operations, process management.

title: Build minimal Linux kernel for microVMs
description: Build stripped-down vmlinux (~4MB) optimized for fast boot. Target kernel 5.10 or 6.1 LTS.
close_reason: Created kernel build infrastructure: microvm.config (optimized for Firecracker with virtio, vsock, PVH boot), build-kernel.sh script, Dockerfile for cross-platform builds, images/README.md documentation. Also added 100-VM stress test (tests/stress_test.rs) that will validate once Firecracker VMM is implemented.

title: Create skills/plugins for IDE integration
description: Build skills/plugins for integration with coding environments. Allow agents to interact with agentkernel sandboxes through familiar interfaces.
close_reason: Completed - Claude Code plugin with /sandbox skill created and working

title: Implement Firecracker API client
description: Create Rust client for Firecracker's HTTP API over Unix socket. Handle VM configuration, boot, and lifecycle operations.
close_reason: Implemented native Rust Firecracker API client with hyper over Unix sockets

title: Implement per-project configuration
description: Add per-project config support so projects can define their own build environments. Config should specify: base image, dependencies, env vars, and agent preferences.
close_reason: Implemented per-project configuration via agentkernel.toml with init command to generate config, and create --config flag to use it. Supports sandbox, agent, dependencies, scripts, mounts, network, and resources sections.

title: Build sandbox isolation layer
description: Implement sandbox isolation for agent execution. Ensure file system isolation, network controls, and resource limits. Prevent cross-session interference.
close_reason: Implemented sandbox isolation: bind mounts for project directories, port mappings with localhost binding, resource limits (CPU/memory), security hardening (dropped NET_RAW/SYS_ADMIN/SYS_PTRACE/MKNOD caps, no-new-privileges)

title: Agentkernel: Microkernel for AI Agents
description: A Firecracker-inspired microkernel that provides sandboxed execution environments for AI coding agents. Supports Claude Code, Gemini CLI, Codex, and OpenCode in isolated Docker containers with per-project configuration.

title: Create Claude Code skill plugin
description: Create a Claude Code plugin with sandbox skill and /sandbox command for easy integration.
close_reason: Created Claude Code plugin with sandbox skill and /sandbox command in claude-plugin/ directory

title: Implement Docker container installation
description: Create installation mechanism that deploys into a common Docker container. Should handle base image selection, dependency installation, and agent runtime setup.
close_reason: Implemented Docker container management with bollard: create/start/stop/remove/list sandboxes, config parsing for agentkernel.toml, base image pulling, dependency installation setup

title: Implement Docker-based KVM host for macOS
description: Docker container with KVM support for running Firecracker on macOS via nested virtualization. Dockerfile.kvm-host.

title: Add HTTP API for agent integration
description: RESTful HTTP API for creating, managing, and executing commands in sandboxes. Enables integration with any AI agent or automation tool. Commands: agentkernel serve
